channel.title: Something wrong with running my client
channel.description: Okay I've been trying to get an answer all day I've searched for 3 days straight now and I've downloaded many versions of java and put them in the right folders for some reason I cant get my clients to run they just open then close really fast. So if someone can help me for once please direct me straight to the right java file I need to download or tell me what to do because everything I've tried has been a complete failure.

item.title: Something wrong with running my client
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

When downloading the java, you don’t need to place them in a spersific folder manually, it does that automatically…

Read full topic
item.source: Something wrong with running my client
